general.name: mos_target_gaia_dr2_source
general.description: Gaia DR2 Source Table. See https://gea.esac.esa.int/archive/documentation/GDR2/Gaia_archive/chap_datamodel/sec_dm_main_tables/ssec_dm_gaia_source.html for complete details.

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

general.naming_convention: $MOS_TARGET/[V_TARG]/mos_gaia_dr2_source-[NUM].fits, where V_TARG=1.0.1 for DR18; and NUM = 1..1 to partition the file into parts

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

solution_id.name: SOLUTION_ID
solution_id.description: ID that identifies the version of all the subsystems that were used in the generation of the data as well as the input data used

designation.name: DESIGNATION
designation.description: Unique source designation across all Gaia data releases

source_id.name: SOURCE_ID
source_id.description: Unique source identifier within a particular Gaia data release

random_index.name: RANDOM_INDEX
random_index.description: Random index which can be used to select smaller subsets of the data

ra_error.name: RA_ERROR
ra_error.description: Standard error of the right ascension

parallax.name: PARALLAX
parallax.description: Absolute stellar parallax of the source at the reference epoch

pmra.name: PMRA
pmra.description: Proper motion in right ascension direction

pmra_error.name: PMRA_ERROR
pmra_error.description: Standard error of proper motion in right ascension direction

pmdec_error.name: PMDEC_ERROR
pmdec_error.description: Standard error of proper motion in declination direction

ra_dec_corr.name: RA_DEC_CORR
ra_dec_corr.description: Correlation between right ascension and declination

ra_parallax_corr.name: RA_PARALLAX_CORR
ra_parallax_corr.description: Correlation between right ascension and parallax

ra_pmra_corr.name: RA_PMRA_CORR
ra_pmra_corr.description: Correlation between right ascension and proper motion in right ascension

ra_pmdec_corr.name: RA_PMDEC_CORR
ra_pmdec_corr.description: Correlation between right ascension and proper motion in declination

dec_pmra_corr.name: DEC_PMRA_CORR
dec_pmra_corr.description: Correlation between declination and proper motion in right ascension

dec_pmdec_corr.name: DEC_PMDEC_CORR
dec_pmdec_corr.description: Correlation between declination and proper motion in declination

parallax_pmra_corr.name: PARALLAX_PMRA_CORR
parallax_pmra_corr.description: Correlation between parallax and proper motion in right ascension

parallax_pmdec_corr.name: PARALLAX_PMDEC_CORR
parallax_pmdec_corr.description: Correlation between parallax and proper motion in declination

pmra_pmdec_corr.name: PMRA_PMDEC_CORR
pmra_pmdec_corr.description: Correlation between proper motion in right ascension and proper motion in declination

astrometric_gof_al.name: ASTROMETRIC_GOF_AL
astrometric_gof_al.description: Goodness of fit statistic of model wrt along-scan observations

astrometric_params_solved.name: ASTROMETRIC_PARAMS_SOLVED
astrometric_params_solved.description: Which parameters have been solved for

astrometric_primary_flag.name: ASTROMETRIC_PRIMARY_FLAG
astrometric_primary_flag.description: Flag indicating if this source was used as a primary source (true) or secondary source (false)

astrometric_weight_al.name: ASTROMETRIC_WEIGHT_AL
astrometric_weight_al.description: Mean astrometric weight of the source

astrometric_pseudo_colour.name: ASTROMETRIC_PSEUDO_COLOUR
astrometric_pseudo_colour.description: Astrometrically determined pseudocolour of the source

astrometric_pseudo_colour_error.name: ASTROMETRIC_PSEUDO_COLOUR_ERROR
astrometric_pseudo_colour_error.description: Standard error of the pseudocolour of the source

astrometric_matched_observations.name: ASTROMETRIC_MATCHED_OBSERVATIONS
astrometric_matched_observations.description: number of FOV transits matched to this source

visibility_periods_used.name: VISIBILITY_PERIODS_USED
visibility_periods_used.description: Number of visibility periods used in the astrometric solution

astrometric_sigma5d_max.name: ASTROMETRIC_SIGMA5D_MAX
astrometric_sigma5d_max.description: Longest semi-major axis of the 5-d error ellipsoid

frame_rotator_object_type.name: FRAME_ROTATOR_OBJECT_TYPE
frame_rotator_object_type.description: Type of the source mainly used for frame rotation

matched_observations.name: MATCHED_OBSERVATIONS
matched_observations.description: Total number of FOV transits matched to this source

phot_g_n_obs.name: PHOT_G_N_OBS
phot_g_n_obs.description: Number of observations contributing to G photometry

phot_g_mean_flux_over_error.name: PHOT_G_MEAN_FLUX_OVER_ERROR
phot_g_mean_flux_over_error.description: G-band mean flux divided by its error

phot_bp_n_obs.name: PHOT_BP_N_OBS
phot_bp_n_obs.description: Number of observations contributing to BP photometry

phot_bp_mean_flux_error.name: PHOT_BP_MEAN_FLUX_ERROR
phot_bp_mean_flux_error.description: Error on the integrated BP mean flux

phot_bp_mean_flux_over_error.name: PHOT_BP_MEAN_FLUX_OVER_ERROR
phot_bp_mean_flux_over_error.description: Integrated BP mean flux divided by its error

phot_rp_n_obs.name: PHOT_RP_N_OBS
phot_rp_n_obs.description: Number of observations contributing to RP photometry

phot_rp_mean_flux_error.name: PHOT_RP_MEAN_FLUX_ERROR
phot_rp_mean_flux_error.description: Error on the integrated RP mean flux

phot_rp_mean_flux_over_error.name: PHOT_RP_MEAN_FLUX_OVER_ERROR
phot_rp_mean_flux_over_error.description: Integrated RP mean flux divided by its error

rv_nb_transits.name: RV_NB_TRANSITS
rv_nb_transits.description: Number of transits used to compute radial velocity

rv_template_teff.name: RV_TEMPLATE_TEFF
rv_template_teff.description: Teff of the template used to compute radial velocity

rv_template_logg.name: RV_TEMPLATE_LOGG
rv_template_logg.description: logg of the template used to compute radial velocity

rv_template_fe_h.name: RV_TEMPLATE_FE_H
rv_template_fe_h.description: Fe/H of the template used to compute radial velocity

a_g_val.name: A_G_VAL
a_g_val.description: Line-of-sight extinction in the G band
